c74object.name: ossia.view
c74object.description: ossia.view allows to bind to a model patcher and define a scope to the ossia.remote at the same level patcher or below to automatically bind to corresponding ossia.parameters

inlet.name: INLET_NAME
inlet.digest: Value to set the parameter to.

outlet.name: OUTLET_NAME
outlet.digest: Value the parameter was set to.
